author: lundblad
msg: * subversion/svnserve/main.c (main): Remove _() around a non-translatable
string.

author: dlr
msg: Add a new 'svnmerge.py integrated' command, which tells you which
change sets have been merged into a branch (the inverse of 'avail').
This is a precursor to implementation of the 'rollback' command, which
requires some of the functionality of 'integrated' command, and
facilitates smoother usability (since you'll often run 'integrated' to
figure out what revisions to 'rollback').
* contrib/client-side/svnmerge.py
(merge_props_to_revision_set): New conversion helper function
factored out of main() which coerces the merge properties returned
by get_merge_props() for a specific path into a RevisionSet object.
(display_revisions): New function factored out of action_avail()
which shows a set of revisions in the requested style (numerically,
log format, or as diffs).
(action_avail): Leverage display_revisions().
(action_integrated): New function implementing the 'integrated'
command.  Internal execution of 'svn log' will be refactored by
David James later on (probably into RevisionLog).
(command_table): Add support for 'integrated' command.
(main): Add handling for the 'integrated' command.  Leverage
branch_props_to_revision_set().
* contrib/client-side/svnmerge_test.py
(testNoWc, testCheckNoIntegrationInfo, testBasic,
testMergeRecordOnly): Add testing of the new "integrated" command.
Review by: djames

author: nori
msg: Japanese translation updates.
* subversion/po/ja.po: Update translation against r19108 by working on
untranslated/fuzzy entries added at r18629:19108.  Also, improve
translation for some messages.
Now ja.po has 1451 translated messages against r19108 (Emacs PO-mode
status: "1452t204o").

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Pass up pending errors if we run into an problem during update (like a
checksum mismatch); otherwise, include the error code for reference.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/update.c
(finish_report): Return a pending error if we have one; otherwise, create
a wrapped error and include the status code.

author: rooneg
msg: Merged revisions 18914-19106 from trunk to the fs-atomic-renames branch.
